suite.name: Webautomation

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Debug
kw.doc: Open a interactive shell, run any RobotFramework keywords.

kw.name: Dado que o cliente esteja na tela home do site
Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//a[@title="Log in to your customer account"]'.

kw.name: Quando o cliente clicar no link de sing in, inserir um email válido e clicar no link
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então ele irá preencher os dados obrigatórios, submeter cadastro e será levado para página com a mensagem
kw.arg: Welcome to your account. Here you can manage all of your personal information and orders.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id_state' by label Texas.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.msg: ${t_mensagem} = Welcome to your account. Here you can manage all of your personal information and orders.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: Aqui estarão todos os cenários de automação WEB.
